Enrollment study conduct two stage . In Stage I study , approximately 400 subject receive non-biological DMARDs ( exception methotrexate [ MTX ] monotherapy MTX leflunomide combination therapy ) enrol . In Stage II study , approximately 160 subject receive Federal Drug Administration-approved biological DMARD time screen enrol .
